column1: Funeral procession from the George L. Doherty Funeral Home
column2: 855 Broadway (Powder House Sq.) Somerville on Wednesday
column3: June 17th at 10 AM followed by a Funeral Mass in St. Ann Church
column4: Somerville at 11AM. Relatives and friends invited to attend. Calling hours Tuesday 4PM to 8PM. Interment Woodlawn Cemetery
